segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's water everywhere and she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy climbing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's going to fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's going to get a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is going to be a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so quiet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make a sound.
segments.speaker: PAR
